title: Through the Looking Glass (Part 1)
description: Readers are introduced to young Alice. After finding a way through her mirror, she enters a bizarre house filled with living chess pieces and backwards poetry. She runs off to see what the rest of this odd world is like.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
reviewWords: Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge before and during reading
